Name: Magic Summoning Adventure
About the game: In order to defeat the devil, the magician Aike embarked on her journey Continue to learn new skills during the adventure and use various skills to defeat monsters In this game, players control the magician Ai Ke to pass levels, use their ingenuity to fight against different monsters, and match different skills to win
